mapper.select: SELECT hmpt.PAYMENT_TERM_ID, hmpt.PAYMENT_TERM_CODE, hmpt.PAYMENT_TERM_NAME, hmpt.DAYS, hmpt.AP_FLAG, hmpt.AR_FLAG, hcvv1.MEANING AP_FLAG_NAME, hcvv2.MEANING AR_FLAG_NAME FROM HPMS_MDM_PAYMENT_TERM hmpt LEFT JOIN HPMS_CODE_VALUE_V hcvv1 ON hmpt.AP_FLAG = hcvv1.VALUE AND hcvv1.CODE = 'SYS.YES_NO' AND hcvv1.LANG = #{request.locale, jdbcType = VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN HPMS_CODE_VALUE_V hcvv2 ON hmpt.AR_FLAG = hcvv2.VALUE AND hcvv2.CODE = 'SYS.YES_NO' AND hcvv2.LANG = #{request.locale, jdbcType = VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 AND hmpt.PAYMENT_TERM_ID like #{paymentTermId , jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND hmpt.PAYMENT_TERM_CODE like #{paymentTermCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
